graph.original_query: ### üß†Generate a Stunning LLM Chat UI (HTML/CSS/JS - Modular)You're an expert frontend engineer and UX designer building a **production-grade LLM Chat UI** for a **VC pitch**. Please generate a **visually stunning, dark-themed UI**, split across **3 files**:* `index.html` ‚Äì the HTML skeleton* `styles.css` ‚Äì all visual styling* `script.js` ‚Äì all JavaScript logic and interactionsThis UI should feel modern, intuitive, and *ready to impress investors*.---### ‚úÖ Required Features#### üìå General* Professional layout using modern HTML5 best practices* Modular: split logic into 3 files (no inline CSS or JS)* Fully responsive (works across screen sizes)#### üé® `styles.css`* Dark theme: elegant colors, good contrast, legible fonts* Transitions and subtle animations (e.g., sidebar toggle, message fade-in)* Neumorphism or glassmorphism optional but welcome* Styles for:  * Header  * Sidebar (collapsible)  * Chat messages (user & LLM)  * Buttons, dropdowns, inputs, scrollbars  * Chat bubbles, timestamps, avatar icons (optional)#### üèóÔ∏è `index.html`* Layout structure:  * Top **Header** with app name + LLM model selector dropdown  * Left **Sidebar**: collapsible + searchable chat history (list of past conversations with titles)  * Right **Main Chat Window**: scrollable list of messages  * Bottom **Input bar** with a textbox + send button* Sample simulated chat (10‚Äì15 messages)* One message should include an image/chart (use base64 or placeholder)#### üí° `script.js`* Handle:  * Sidebar toggle  * LLM model change (console log or simulate setting)  * Chat search filter  * Sending messages (append to chat window)  * Share chat (copy link to clipboard + show confirmation)* Dynamically populate LLM model dropdown using a JS array* Animate chat message appearance (e.g., fade-in on append)---### üìÅ Output FormatPlease generate 3 separate code blocks:```html<!-- index.html --><html>...</html>``````css/* styles.css */body { ... }``````javascript// script.jsdocument.addEventListener(...)```Use **realistic naming**, no placeholder lorem ipsum. Make it VC-pitch-ready ‚Äî bold, beautiful, and full-featured. Don‚Äôt skip visual polish.

globals_schema.execution_result_T001: Generated a visually stunning, dark-themed, fully responsive `index.html` file for an LLM chat UI with sample simulated chat.
globals_schema.execution_result_T002: Generated a visually stunning dark theme CSS file for the LLM chat UI, including styles for various elements and optional neumorphism/glassmorphism.
globals_schema.execution_result_T003: Generated script.js with LLM chat UI functionality.

analysis.content_summary: Simple LLM chat UI with a header, sidebar, main chat window, and input bar.
analysis.sample_content: LLM Chat Interface, GPT-4, Chat History, Hello!

file_profiles.summary: HTML file defines the structure and style for a basic LLM chat interface.

nodes.description: Generate the index.html file with header, sidebar, chat window, & input bar.
nodes.agent_prompt: Generate a visually stunning, dark-themed, fully responsive `index.html` file for an LLM chat UI. The layout should include a top Header with the app name and an LLM model selector dropdown, a left Sidebar with a collapsible and searchable chat history, a right Main Chat Window with a scrollable list of messages, and a bottom Input bar with a textbox and send button. Include sample simulated chat (10-15 messages) with one message containing an image/chart (use base64 or a placeholder). Ensure proper HTML5 best practices are followed and the structure is modular, ready to be styled with CSS and interactive with JS.

output.execution_result_T001: Generated a visually stunning, dark-themed, fully responsive `index.html` file for an LLM chat UI with sample simulated chat.

execution_result.execution_result_T001: Generated a visually stunning, dark-themed, fully responsive `index.html` file for an LLM chat UI with sample simulated chat.

nodes.description: Generate the styles.css file with dark theme and visual styling.
nodes.agent_prompt: Generate a `styles.css` file for the LLM chat UI with a visually stunning dark theme. Ensure the styles include elegant colors, good contrast, and legible fonts. Implement transitions and subtle animations for elements like the sidebar toggle and message fade-in. Use neumorphism or glassmorphism optionally. Define styles for the Header, Sidebar (collapsible), Chat messages (user & LLM), Buttons, dropdowns, inputs, scrollbars, and optional Chat bubbles with timestamps and avatar icons.

output.execution_result_T002: Generated a visually stunning dark theme CSS file for the LLM chat UI, including styles for various elements and optional neumorphism/glassmorphism.

execution_result.execution_result_T002: Generated a visually stunning dark theme CSS file for the LLM chat UI, including styles for various elements and optional neumorphism/glassmorphism.

nodes.description: Generate the script.js file to handle UI interactions and logic.
nodes.agent_prompt: Generate a `script.js` file for the LLM chat UI. Implement functionality to handle sidebar toggle, LLM model change (console log or simulate setting), chat search filter, sending messages (append to chat window), and share chat (copy link to clipboard + show confirmation). Dynamically populate the LLM model dropdown using a JavaScript array. Animate chat message appearance (e.g., fade-in on append).

output.execution_result_T003: Generated script.js with LLM chat UI functionality.

execution_result.execution_result_T003: Generated script.js with LLM chat UI functionality.

nodes.description: Consolidate and format the HTML, CSS, and JS summaries into a comprehensive VC-pitch-ready report.
nodes.agent_prompt: Create a Markdown formatted summary of the LLM Chat UI, incorporating the key aspects of the HTML structure (`html_summary_T004`), CSS styling (`css_summary_T005`), and JavaScript functionality (`js_summary_T006`). Ensure the report is visually appealing and highlights the professional layout, dark theme, responsiveness, and key features for a VC pitch.
